sources.title: Sweepstake Annie
sources.description: Annie Foster works in the movie business, and we get to see behind the scenes of a movie shoot in the 1930's as we meet Annie and her universe. She wins a fortune and thinks that all of her problems will disappear, but new ones then come to take their place.

sources.title: Sweepstake Annie  (1935) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Tom Brown, Marian Nixon, Wera Engels 
Director: William Nigh

A young woman who works in the movie business buys a sweepstakes ticket that turns out to be a winner. Her stroke of luck changes her life around--but not necessarily for the better.

metadata.Plot: A young woman who works in the movie business buys a sweepstakes ticket that turns out to be a winner. Her stroke of luck changes her life around--and not necessarily for the better.
metadata.Actors: Tom Brown, Marian Nixon, Wera Engels
